```
#!/bin/bash

# Exploit script for vulnerability in XYZ software

# Set target IP address
TARGET_IP="192.168.1.1"

# Set port number to exploit
PORT="8080"

# Set exploit payload
PAYLOAD="echo 'Hello, World!'"

# Send HTTP request with payload to target IP and port
curl -X POST -H "Host: $TARGET_IP:$PORT" -d "$PAYLOAD" http://$TARGET_IP:$PORT

# Check for successful response
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "Exploit successful!"
else
    echo "Exploit failed."
fi
```
